participant_2.background:
I love most music except country and jazz.
My favorite food is anything italian.
I am a gym rat that loves to play racquetball.
My favorite tv shows are forensic files and jeopardy.
My favorite book that i ve read lately is middlesex.

content.text: Nice to meet you! What are some of your hobbies?
I love to play racquetball, I'm a gym rat! I also love watching Forensic Files and Jeopardy.
Wow, I've never played racquetball before, but it sounds like a lot of fun! I love Jeopardy too, it's so addicting!
It is! Have you read the book Middlesex? It's a really good book, I just finished reading it.
No, I haven't. What's it about?
It's about a person who is born as a hermaphrodite, and it explores their journey of finding their identity.
Oh, that sounds really interesting! I'll have to check it out.
You should, it's a really good book.
So, what kind of music do you like?
I love most music, except for country and jazz. I'm really into Italian food, and I love to cook. I actually auditioned on a cooking show once, but I didn't make it past the first round.
Wow, that's really cool! I love to cook too, but I've never been on a cooking show. I'm really good at making Italian food, so maybe I should audition for a show!
You should! I'm sure you'd be great on it.
Thanks! I'll definitely look into it.
